guide.title: Offer a few ideas and try to describe yourself from these points：
guide.one: · What you think is worthy of praise；
guide.two: · The biggest challenge you've ever overcome；
guide.three: · What you value most in your job search；
guide.four: · Personal projects or events that you've been proud of；
guide.five: · If you are a team leader, talk about your management philosophy and unique industry insights；
guide.six: · Other things you think can show your strengths；
